ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] JM Capozi
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Like I said, you missed me ;) I was working at the Faire, as I always do.  This year, I m mostly in a shop, but at noon, I was giving the hat-stand vendor
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:52 AM 11/6/2001 -0600, you wrote:
>Ok, so where the **** were you?
>I was the bard, in lambent, in the costume contest...

Like I said, you missed me ;)

I was working at the Faire, as I always do. This year, I'm mostly in a
shop, but at noon, I was giving the hat-stand vendor in Sherwood Forest a
break. That's when a nice young lady came up and asked me where the EQ
meeting was, so I led her there. I got to see everyone in line for food,
then had to get back to work. *sighs*
At least I'm making good money.

Back to EQ-related questions:

Do you think a Bard can survive in EK at 16? Solo?

Talies
